definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[פרע]] (√ of foll.; cf. perh. Ar. paros0 overtop, fig. excel; fara9a noble, eminent man; Sab. [[פרע]] be lofty Os:ZMG xix (1865), 178 f., [[פרע]] highest part SabDenkm:90, fig.best, DHM:ib., 32 f. CIS:iv. No. 2. 1. 13 esp. of offering DHM:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 341 ff. (cf. Ar. far9un firstling offered to gods)).
